~$ Hello World!

Posted on Oct. 15th, 2020.

Tags:Personal


Well, this is the start to my blog !

Do I have interesting stuff to talk about ? Well... that depends what you -- the reader -- consider interesting.

Do you consider a few things that go on in my life, usually relating in some shape, way or form to the content listed below, to be interesting ?

  • Development
    • CLI
    • GUI
    • PWA
    • Mobile
    • IoT
  • InfoSec
  • OSINT
  • Academia

If so, you've come to the right place !

Am I an avid blogger that will spam your feeds with content ?
Short answer: No.

Am I someone that may have critical or contentious points of view ?
Short answer: Yes, and viewer discretion is advised.
